extendedInfo.description: Lookout Security & Antivirus offers essential protection to your phone and tablet against malware, viruses, loss and theft. More than 40 million customers trust Lookout:â âBest app EVER! Found my lost phone using Lookout!ââ âBest Anti Virus for Android phones!ââ âSecurity, back-up and locator all in one. Love it!âAnd the press loves Lookout:â TechCrunch - âTop 10 Best Free Appsââ LAPTOP Magazine â âThe Best Mobile Security Solution for Android Devices!ââ PCWorld - âLookout should be one of your first stops on the Android Market!âLookout Security & Antivirus FREE Features:âºSECURITY & ANTIVIRUSâ¢ App Scanning: Continuous, over-the-air protection from viruses, malware, adware and spywareâºFIND MY PHONEâ¢ Locate & Scream: Map the location of your device and make it sound an alarm - even when it is on silent!â¢ Signal Flare: Automatically save your phone's location when the battery is lowâ¢ Lock Cam: Get an email with the picture and location of whoever incorrectly enters the passcode 3 timesâºBACKUP & RESTOREâ¢ Contact Backup: Save a copy of your Google contactsâ¢ Restore: Restore your contacts to your existing phone or tableLookout offers a two-week FREE trial - no credit card info required - of its Premium features, including:+ Safe Browsing: Block dangerous URLs + Privacy Advisor: See what personal information can be accessed by other apps+ Lock & Wipe: Remotely lock your device, post a custom message and erase your data+ Other Premium features: photo & call history backup, restore or transfer data to a new device, Premium Tech Support, and More!After your trial ends, you can continue to enjoy Lookoutâs FREE features to keep your device safe and secure!Lookout Security & Antivirus is available in German, French, Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese (Traditional and Simplified), Korean, Russian and Polish.Note: If youâre on Android 2.2+ (Froyo) and have trouble uninstalling, go to Settings -> Location & Security -> Select Device Administrators and uncheck Lookout. Contact us at support [at] Lookout.com for questions.â Learn about the latest security threats at https://blog.lookout.comâ Learn about our permissions at https://www.lookout.com/permissions â Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/mylookoutâ Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/lookoutKW: Antivirus, Anti-virus, Antivirus, Security, Backup, Find My Droid, Find My Phone, Lost Phone, Phone Finder, Phone Locator, Phone Tracker, Anti Virus Protection, Trojan, Malware, Spyware,Lockout, GPS Tracker, Anti Theft, Theft Protection, Stolen Phone, Outlook, Anti-theft, Adware

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Amazing it works no regrets u rlly need this app without it ur device will never be as protected as it is with lookout I\'d tell everyone to get it or would recommend it to everyone so get this amazing b Best security app ever!!!!!!!!!!!:)
reviews.author: Mackinzie Moulton

reviews.title: I recommend it to all my friends
reviews.comment: The only problem I see is you have to have it on speaker phone to pick up the other person conversation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: U don\'t really use it that much,  but it detects all of the bad software on my phone.......
reviews.author: Tim Fish

reviews.title: Uhm
reviews.comment: I wish the package file was smaller and able to move to SD card... other than that great
reviews.author: marie bondank

reviews.title: GS4
reviews.comment: Just wish free version has scream feature and remote wipe. Tough to decide between this and AVG. AVG does that for free but has no low battery location flare.
reviews.author: Vasek Cekan

reviews.title: Best guess...
reviews.comment: Funny thing about these security apps - you really don\'t know if they do anything So I guess its working fine?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I feel much better using things on my phone with this running. I do have the paid version now, but liked the free one, too. Works great on HTC evo.
reviews.author: Wendee Dunlap

reviews.title: Dont bother
reviews.comment: I experimented with the \'find your device\' section of this app. I only wish i could put a screen shot on here to show you just how far 728 metres is, that\'s how far it said my phone was from itself !!! I actually had my phone right next to me as u may have guessed. I just dont know how they get such ridiculous results ? Find my device isn\'t worth having, you will see what i mean if you ever need it. Wont be buying this again.
reviews.author: Mark Livsey

reviews.title: Absolutely great! Keeps your phone safe from all kinds of dodgystuff!
reviews.comment: Absolutely great! Saved my phone from lots of dodgy stuff.
reviews.author: Oliver Davies

reviews.title: Backup.
reviews.comment: How come it does not back up all of my pictures & contacts? Wtf? I have close to 300 pictures & it only backed up 5, & I have over 100 contacts & it jus backed up 4? Explanation?
reviews.author: Byron Collins

reviews.title: Quality and as advertised
reviews.comment: Never had a problem gr eat great stuff
reviews.author: Anthony Gonzalez

reviews.title: Overall great.
reviews.comment: I don\'t see this app very useful for scanning apps (as any google phone can verify the apps before installation anyways), however, for all other security purposes and backup methods this app is flawless.
reviews.author: Stefan Mohler

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Have had no problems at all with this app
reviews.author: Jimmy Johnson

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: I like the different security options the free one offers.
reviews.author: Kelsey Scantland

reviews.title: LG optimus L9
reviews.comment: Works great. Premium service. I love it,it lets me know right away if an app is safe. And tells me what to look out for.  And backs up everything without sharing. Awesome app. The best. Deewebb50
reviews.author: delia webb

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I will do without a lot of other apps before this.  It is always the first to be loaded/reloaded.
reviews.author: Ralph Blackford

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: No issues since installed over a year ago. wish the free version can support more than 2 devices though.
reviews.author: Fletcher Aragon

reviews.title: Great security
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app for a long time. Gives me weekly status on my phone and ipad. So I know it is doing something. Gives me stats on my other apps and their updates. I live in Colorado Springs and found my ipad in San Antonio, TX.
reviews.author: Paul Jasko

reviews.title: Good software
reviews.comment: Trust lookout for my phone tones of great features

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Almost as good as Norton!
